detectors.description:
EthexJackpot.settleJackpot() (EthexLoto_105.sol#135-160) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- payAmounts[i_scope_1] > 0 && ! getAddress(wins[i_scope_1]).send(payAmounts[i_scope_1]) (EthexLoto_105.sol#158)
detectors.markdown:
[EthexJackpot.settleJackpot()](EthexLoto_105.sol#L135-L160) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [payAmounts[i_scope_1] > 0 && ! getAddress(wins[i_scope_1]).send(payAmounts[i_scope_1])](EthexLoto_105.sol#L158)

detectors.description:
EthexJackpot.settleJackpot() (EthexLoto_105.sol#135-160) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- block.number == start || (start < block.number - 256) (EthexLoto_105.sol#145)
detectors.markdown:
[EthexJackpot.settleJackpot()](EthexLoto_105.sol#L135-L160) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [block.number == start || (start < block.number - 256)](EthexLoto_105.sol#L145)
